content: Good morning! It's a pleasure to meet you, Jeyachandran. I'm Jeyachandran, your hiring officer for this technical round. We've gone through your resume, and I must say, you have an impressive list of projects and skills. Can you tell me more about your experience as an AI project developer at SHINE LOGICS? What was your role, and what specific contributions did you make to the project?
yes sir i am a full stack developer

As a full-stack developer, you've worked on various projects, including the AI-powered chatbot at SHINE LOGICS. Can you walk me through your thought process when designing and implementing the chatbot's real-time database integration and voice automation? What were some of the biggest challenges you faced, and how did you overcome them?
